title: Bug 5340 - Cancelling add exception breakpoint has no effect
OB: When adding an exception breakpoint in the breakpoints pane of the debug perspective, if the cancel button is clicked in the progress dialog, the dialog immediately disappears and the exception list is displayed.
EB: The progress dialog should close when the cancel button is clicked, and the add exception operation should be canceled. Alternatively, the cancel button should be disabled when calling ProgressMonitorDialog.run and passing false for the cancellable parameter.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1) Go to the breakpoints pane in the debug perspective. 2) Click the J! button to add an exception breakpoint. 3) In the progress dialog, click the cancel button.
